Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to prohibiting the sale of electric shock dog collars
Summary: Prohibits the sale or distribution of any electric shock dog collar in the state; provides a civil fine up to $500 for each violation.
LawCode: Add ยง391-w, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of electric shock dog collars
